DOC.brief_summary: Cereal grain contain wide variety different phytochemical may play different role physiology . Their response plasma urine meal poorly define cereal . This study investigate plasma response urinary excretion cereal compound eat 6 different type cereal preparation , focus alkylresorcinols .
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-over , randomize , double blind study 6 arm ( flours different composition ) . Thirteen subject complete trial , 100 g flour , mixed 300 mL milk , fed subject .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Normaloverweight ( BMI 1928 kg/m2 ) Nonsmokers Regular consumer wholegrain cereal Allergy cereal milk product
